content: In field_theory.splitting_field I discovered the lemma nat_degree_multiset_prod which I believe should not be in that file. It looks like nat_degree_prod, which is in algebra.polynomial.big_operators. Is big_operators literally only for things written with a big operator or does it make sense to put the lemma there? If not, what would be another convenient location?
I think your suggestion is good. If it has sufficient imports, that seems like the best place.
Nevermind, it looks like it came from #4061, where it was used for nat_degree_eq_card_roots
